DOC.brief_summary: The Crux Vena Cava Filter ( VCF ) Registry clinical study , sponsor Volcano Corporation , evaluate short long term performance clinical outcome Crux Vena Cava Filter System .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Short Long Term Performance Clinical Outcomes Crux Vena Cava Filter System
DOC.detailed_description: The Crux VCF Registry non-randomized clinical study , sponsor Volcano Corporation , evaluate short long term performance clinical outcome Crux VCF System . The registry include consecutive patient treat Crux VCF post-market ( commercial ) set data collection implant procedure 2 year post implant filter retrieval , whichever come first . Patients may also enrol ( roll-in ) previous Crux VCF implant within previous 6 month . Follow assessment perform 6 , 12 24 month post-implant time retrieval , perform .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The patient > 18 year age . 2 . Patient legally authorize representative understands research nature study willing capable providing inform consent . 3 . Scheduled receives Crux VCF implant ; 4 . Have previously Crux VCF implant within previous 6 month . 1 . Patient schedule filter implant , Crux VCF filter implant due anatomical exclusion technical failure . 2 . Patients unwilling unable comply protocol provide inform consent . 3 . Female patient childbearing potential pregnant ( must negative pregnancy test within 48 hour prior implantation retrieval procedure ) 4 . Patient participate another device drug clinical trial interferes protocol follow schedule .
